Today's drama in a nutshell:
> Hina Misora, arguably WACTOR's biggest streamer has been on leave since December 4th, allegedly due to illness
> complete radio silence from her twitter account since January 3rd, Anons suspect she's instead suspended
> today, Luna Rurine announces she's also taking a break
> at the same time, several of the girls' known rm accounts experience activity, sending cryptic messages about needing help, no I'm not making this up
